remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了从哪个控件适配器可以继承一个通用基类。The class provides a general base class from which control adapters can inherit. 此类提供的默认实现所需的所有适配器的接口。This class provides a default implementation of the interface required for all adapters. 类的基类的默认呈现实现应呈现的所有子控件。The default rendering implementation of the base class should be to render all child controls. 这样，要用作组合控件适配器的基类。This allows the base class to be used as an adapter for composition controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是的实现属性接口，它获取或设置适配器所附加到的控件。The property is an implementation of the property for the interface, which gets or sets the control to which the adapter is attached. 对于单个控件适配器，可以创建强类型化的属性来隐藏属性。For individual control adapters, you can create a strongly typed property to hide the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收回发事件通知，以检查事件是否是特定于适配器时，将由控件调用此方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果该控件实现方法，并接收回发事件，调用的控件适配器的方法。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果向控件发送的事件而异的目标设备，必须调用此方法的控件实现控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示设备适配器是否已处理该事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它将返回`false`默认情况下。It returns `false` by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器可以保存特定于适配器的状态的控件。An adapter can save adapter-specific state for a control. 如果没有此类功能是必需的该适配器返回`null`。If no such functionality is required, the adapter returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于窗体分页。This property is used for form pagination. 值为-1 指示必须使用该元素的默认权重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information, see [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).
